long_description: The REI McCone soft-shell jacket provides comfortable, weather-resistant and windproof protection so you can play outdoors longer even when the weather starts to get pushy. Durable, 4-way stretch fabric has a knit inner face that adds warmth while still letting your body breathe easy; jacket blocks wind to 60 mph. Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off. Seaming is designed for full range of movement. Hood cinches down for a close fit that provides unhindered peripheral vision. REI McCone jacket features 1-hand hem adjustability and adjustable cuffs. Includes 2 zip hand pockets and a zip arm pocket that includes a cord port. Active fit is trim without inhibiting movement.
short_description: The REI McCone soft-shell jacket provides comfortable, weather-resistant and windproof protection so you can play outdoors longer even when the weather starts to get pushy.
